>
[Keen Follower](/Feats.aspx?ID=2136) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 207 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your keen observation of your allies has made you better at following their lead. When using the [Follow the Expert](/Actions.aspx?ID=514) activity in exploration mode, you gain a +3 circumstance bonus if the ally you are following is an expert and a +4 circumstance bonus if your ally is a master.
name: Keen Follower
